contains_no_content_of_requested_type.description: Set to true if the input text contains no military records. Otherwise, set to false.

surname.description: The surname of the individual. Example: 'Franco' or 'Schmidt'.

first_name.description: The first name of the individual. Example: 'Antonio' or 'Carlos'.

record_header.description: The header of the record. Example: 'Batalhão Limeirense'.

location.description: Location and state information. Example: 'LIMEIRA – Estado de São Paulo'.

height.description: The recorded height in meters. Example: 1.65 or 1.55.

eyes.description: Description of the eyes. Example: 'castanhos' or 'azues'. Use null if not provided.

hair_color.description: The hair color. Example: 'castanhos' or 'louro'. Use null if not provided.

hair_texture.description: The hair texture or form. Example: 'lisos' or 'liso'. Use null if not provided.

face.description: The shape or appearance of the face. Example: 'oval' or 'alongado'. Use null if not provided.

nose.description: Description of the nose. Example: 'regular' or 'afilado'. Use null if not provided.

mouth.description: Description of the mouth. Example: 'pequena' or 'regular'. Use null if not provided.

beard.description: Description of the beard. Example: 'feita'. Use null if not provided.

mustache.description: Description of the mustache. Example: 'não usa'. Use null if not provided.

marks.description: Any distinctive marks. Example: 'cicatriz no pulso esquerdo'. Use null if not provided.

birth_date.description: Birth date of the individual. Example: '13 de Dezembro de 1891'. Use null if not provided.

municipality.description: The municipality of registration. Example: 'Limeira'. Use null if not provided.

profession.description: The profession or occupation. Example: 'Lavrador'. Use null if not provided.

assignatura.description: The assignatura or signature detail. Example: 'a rogo'. Use null if not provided.

reservista.description: Indicates if the individual is a reservist. Example: 'não'. Use null if not provided.

officials.description: An array of official positions and their signatures.

position.description: The official position. Example: 'Presidente da Junta'.

signature.description: The recorded signature or name. Example: 'Octavio Bernardes'. Use null if not provided.

father.description: The name of the father. Example: 'Egydio Franco'. Use null if not provided.

mother.description: The name of the mother. Example: 'Da. Júlia Maria de Jesus'. Use null if not provided.

birth_place.description: The place of birth. Example: 'Limeira' or 'Bremen - Alemanha'. Use null if not provided.

civil_status.description: The civil status. Example: 'Solteiro', 'casado', or 'solteira'. Use null if not provided.

vaccinated.description: Vaccination status. Use 'Yes' or 'No', or null if not provided.

can_read.description: Indicates if the individual can read. Use 'Yes' or 'No', or null if not provided.

can_write.description: Indicates if the individual can write. Use 'Yes' or 'No', or null if not provided.

can_count.description: Indicates if the individual can count. Use 'Yes' or 'No', or null if not provided.

swimming.description: Indicates if the individual can swim. Use 'Yes' or 'No', or null if not provided.

cyclist.description: Indicates if the individual is a cyclist. Use 'Yes' or 'No', or null if not provided.

motorcyclist.description: Indicates if the individual is a motorcyclist. Use 'Yes' or 'No', or null if not provided.

driver.description: Indicates if the individual is a driver. Use 'Yes' or 'No', or null if not provided.

chauffeur.description: Indicates if the individual works as a chauffeur. Use 'Yes' or 'No', or null if not provided.

telegraphist.description: Indicates if the individual is a telegraphist. Use 'Yes' or 'No', or null if not provided.

telephonist.description: Indicates if the individual is a telephonist. Use 'Yes' or 'No', or null if not provided.

residence.description: The residence or address. Example: 'Rua Senador Vergueiro', 'Largo Estação, 7, Livraria', or 'R. 10 Marco 22'.

observations.description: Additional observations or notes. Example: '24 anos; Apresentou-se em 13-8-32 às 22 horas.' Use null if not provided.
